channel.title: Awareness

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: andyauthor
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1546919835716{background-image: url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/awareness/wp-content/uploads/sites/41/2015/10/bg1-woman.jpg?id=12) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1489539310938{padding: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.65) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}"][vcex_image image_id="19"][vcex_heading text="Fight against cancer." tag="h2" font_family="Georgia, serif" font_size="48px" color="#c72b77" css=".vc_custom_1489955392192{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 10px !important;}" line_height="1.2" font_weight="normal"][vc_column_text]Breast cancer affects 1 in 8 women. Don’t sit by while this disease takes hold of you or someone you love. Get up and get moving for a cure.[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vcex_button url="https://www.komen.org/" target="blank" title="Join the race" font_family="Georgia, serif" custom_background="#c72b77" custom_hover_background="#ea7eb1" font_size="24px" letter_spacing="1px" border_radius="5px" text_source="custom_text"]Join the race[/vcex_button][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1546919852029{background-image: url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/awareness/wp-content/uploads/sites/41/2015/10/bg2-baby.jpg?id=13) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1489539206829{padding: 30px !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.65) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}"][vcex_heading text="There is HOPE." tag="h2" font_family="Georgia, serif" text_align="right" font_size="48px" color="#ea7eb1" css=".vc_custom_1489955399808{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}" line_height="1.2" font_weight="normal"][vc_column_text]

Check yourself and get screened regularly. Want to do more? Consider making a donation to fund research and help put an end to breast cancer.

[/vc_column_text][vcex_spacing][vcex_button url="https://www.komen.org/how-to-help/donate/other-ways/" target="blank" title="Donate today" align="right" font_family="Georgia, serif" custom_background="#ea7eb1" custom_hover_background="#c72b77" font_size="24px" letter_spacing="1px" border_radius="5px" text_source="custom_text"]Donate today[/vcex_button][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" full_height="yes" css=".vc_custom_1546919868909{background-image: url(https://total.wpexplorer.com/awareness/wp-content/uploads/sites/41/2015/10/bg3-bra.jpg?id=14) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text line_height="1.5"]

“Keep your sunny side up, keep yourself beautiful, and indulge yourself!”

~betsy johnson~

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
